summary: Set in Brazil, three kids who make a discovery in a garbage dump soon find themselves running from the cops and trying to right a terrible wrong.
cast: Rickson Tevez|Wagner Moura|José Dumont|Daniel Zettel|Eduardo Luis|Luis Felipe da Silva Costa|Gabriel Dias da Costa Silva|Selton Mello|Stepan Nercessian|Teca Pereira|Rooney Mara|Letícia Cunha Camara Pereira de Carvalho|Rafael de Biase|Martin Sheen|Israel Gomes|Kauan Faustino|Ana Carolina Faustino|Ewerton Victor de Oliveira|Jonathan Azevedo|Conceiçáo Camarotti|Gabriel Weinstein|Jesuíta Barbosa|Ramon Francisco|Felippo Lessa|Moisés Gomes|Maristela Guimaráes|Deiwis Jamaica|Marcos Antunes Alves Parente|Charles Paraventi|Luis Lobianco|Enrique Diaz|Leandro Firmino|Gisele Fróes|André Ramiro|Nelson Xavier|Ulysses Ferraz|Magdale Alves|Adriano Garib|Maria Eduarda Lima Botelho|Thiare Maia|Igor Costa de Oliveira|Ismar Martins|Dudu Farias|Thais Botelho|Shirley Cruz|Júlio Andrade|Júlio Silvério|Christiane Amanpour|Lexie Kendrick
title: Trash, ladrones de esperanza
